entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Moosomin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
